TopicTitle: Who are you fav KSP youtubers?

Articles.Content:
Danny2462! He makes me laugh way too much.

I also like Tanuki_chau's stuff, though I watch more of her on twitch than YT.

Probably Abyssal Lurker and Matthew Karr. Also Zisteau, when he's posting them. Scott Manley's alright, but I tend not to watch modded KSP, so that leaves me with less.

I don't watch all that many, though.
I watch Scott Manley, Danny2462 and HOCgaming. I really hope NerdCubed and Markiplier someday come back to KSP.
Scott Manley for me. Being part Scots myself, he just cracks me up :-)
Scott Manley taught me how to do some of the more difficult missions. Macey Dean's videos were a lot of fun.
I think he is very underrated I started watching Bob Fitch last night. HOC is great too, and of course Manley.

I agree with most of the popular ones, but there are a lot of good KSP youtubers that are underrated and YOU should be watching them:

1.- CupcakesLanders has an awesome collection of dropships, VTOL and SSTO for you to download on the forums, his piloting abilities are borderline witchcraft, and he created a magnificent collection of jawdropping videos that will have you scratching your head thinking "how he does that?":

2.- Nassault does KSP movies. Seriously, MOVIES, go grab some popcorn because he puts some Hollywood productions to shame:

3.- Thor LP and his "Insane Rockets Division" (awesome name BTW) is fun coated with insanity filled with crazy ideas.

4.- If you like Danny2462 but hate scarce updates, then Xacktar is your man. Go, watch it.

5.- And of course the shameless plug: Myself. My current series covers my challenge to circumnavigate Kerbin on a rover, no mods, no hacks, only stock because HARCORE. Thread here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66887-I%C2%B4m-circumnavigating-Kerbin-on-a-Rover

Edited March 2, 2014 by Wooks
Woot! I revived this thread from cardiac arrest! Woooooooo!!!!
I cannot believe how caught up I just got on Nassault's Star Stuff film. Just... wow.
Maybe start a poll?

I watch Scott Manley, HOCgaming (cant believe hes 14).

What?!? Harv is only 14?! He sounds like a much older.

Back to original question ---> I watch Scott, Danny, Nassault and sometimes HOC and TheWinterOwl.

Edited March 1, 2014 by Magion
Bob Fitch is the best at the moment.

What?!? Harv is only 14?! He sounds like a much older.

Actually, I think he's 15 and going to turn 16.

I'm 13

Edited March 1, 2014 by Pockrtplanesairways
Robbaz , bob fitch
I pretty much only bother with Scott Manley, although these days his missions feel frustratingly rationed out. I know he has to keep the interest built up, but yeah.

Danny2462 is the only one I watch... and Xacator.

I am subscribed to Illectro, but I don't watch that much anymore.
Also CruzanAK. His tutorials on planes and SSTOs are really useful and well made

Kurtjmac makes far to few videos to be on of the best KSP youtubers and i don't really understand why he is in the Special thanks.

Because he was one of the first major YouTubers to cover Kerbal Space Program in a series. Scott Manley became more popular because of Kerbal Space Program, rather than making it popular (in the beginning, that is).

Mine: KurtJMac, Scott Manley, and a smaller channel, Hill Stache.

Scott Manley (same as everyone else it seems ) is my main one, some smaller channels I enjoy are IcyNewYear and Gordon Gillespie although their channels aren't primarily focused on ksp they both have ksp series.

Scott Manley

Hocgaming

Enterelysium

thewinterowl

Kurtjmac

Edit: How did I forget Danny??

Edited March 2, 2014 by Goldham
danny, sometimes hoc, and i've seen some scott manley, but he, in my opinion is way too serious...

Nassalt and Scott Manley.

Nassalt, because he makes the best videos ever. I mean have you seen Kerbal?! All he makes is gold.

And Scott Manley, because he breaks things down into the simplest terms that anybody can understand without sounding like a know it all.
Scott Manley!

Scott Manley should be the teacher of all that is Kerbal. He has taught me almost everything I know, from how to make orbit, to getting to other planets. And to make things better, hes full of awesome little facts along the way that you can use to sound cleverererer!

What about the little guys?!

i.e. mareczex333, 5th Horseman & Cuthbert Cream??
